name: A Very Last Minute Christmas
description:
It's Christmas time! 

Eggnog! Kisses under mistletoe! Santa Claus! Wait, what are those things under that tree? Oh, shit!

It's Christmas time! And you forget to buy presents for, well, for everyone. You have one minute left before leaving for the party.  

Will you be able to find among your belongings the perfect gift (or at least the less shitty one) for all your friends?

Warning: the menu buttons are not working! Don't panic, just close and restart the game if you want to play again.

 Sad  Fun facts
  1. That's really the house of one of the team members.
  2. Greek assets were supposed to be used in another game.
  3. The game was made the day before the deadline in a 10 hours rush inside the house at point 1. So the struggle of fighting against time was 100% real.
Music

Jingle Bells Jazz (Instrumental) by E's Jammy Jams
